Another Subheading (h3)

This is a simple example demonstrating how to use HTML for headers, lists, links, and colors.

Unordered List

  • Item 1
  • Item 2
  • Item 3

Ordered List

  1. First item
  2. Second item
  3. Third item

Links

Here is a link to Example Website.

Colored Text

This is a paragraph with teal-colored text.

This is a paragraph with purple-colored text.

Inline vs. Block Elements

This is a span element (inline) inside a paragraph. Inline elements do not start on a new line and are part of the surrounding text.

This is a div element (block). Block elements start on a new line and take up the full width available.
